channel.title: [RuneIntel] NoobyMcNoob is a Jagex Moderator
channel.description:
Okay, so last night there was a big debate on my latest RuneIntel as to who these first time posters were. One of them was "NoobyMcNoob" (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=7328). He claimed that he was infact a Jagex Moderator.
Since I am the best at intelligence, I discovered this "NoobyMcNoob" person was is Mark Hulmes. Mark is 19 years old, and lives in Cambridge, UK. This is the same city that Jagex has their headquarters. Mark works in the Customer Support area of Jagex. Similarly to Laura Watton, Mark is an amateur artist.
If you'd like to see his artwork, check out his [url=http://princessmark.deviantart.com/]DeviantArt[/url].
[b]MSN Address removed until its confirmed hes allowing it[/b]

item.title: [RuneIntel] NoobyMcNoob is a Jagex Moderator
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Pie 0wnz:

Yep, he better not close us down…

rofl i will get the train to his house and beat the crap out of him if that happens

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse

[quote=“james, post:17, topic:5097”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=6656.msg70882#msg70882 date=1153223444]

davi you acted against the rules that you signed an agreement for so stfu right now

and what the fuck do you know? they locked my account because i apealed with the option “i think customer support made a mistake” and because of that they were like oh he is a fag and lock my account… im not joking, i was apealing against black marks i got because i asked that drissy (wt fakawi) be unbanned because the comedy train got out of hand and he was banned unfairly…
[/quote]
from what i heard dissy was swearing at the chinese bots[/quote]
well i was wrong their, but does that mean they can lock my account? wtf and they are acusing me of stealing it…

item.title: [RuneIntel] NoobyMcNoob is a Jagex Moderator
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:2, topic:5097”]um in his last post it says not to release the address did yo get concent from him? if not we should probly remove because we arnt bullies now =p

Hahah, Why cant a Jagex Mod over 21 say Roflcoptorians?! Its a brilliant word, it express high levels of amusement.

As long as you guys dont go off and do anything dodgy with the information you find about Jmods, then I personally have no problem with it. Although shame on you for cheating on Runescape!
I’ll admit its a little creepy, but as long as its just for “I wonder if I can find it out” then no problems here.

As for me being “owned” because it was 1am, we have users all over the world, seems silly to only work UK times right? I leave the rest to you.

Oh and Vipsta, thanks but no thanks, my MSN is for my friends only, thanks for the gesture though.

Barbara WinZor!

IF either one of you can give ma a confirm that hes ok with the release of the msn address i will gladly allow it to be posted but he did state he didnt want it publically released so better safe than sorry :)[/quote]

Remove his DeviantArt link too…It’s in there.

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneIntel] NoobyMcNoob is a Jagex Moderator
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Since I am the best at intelligence

It appears you are the best at something.

IF either one of you can give ma a confirm that hes ok with the release of the msn address i will gladly allow it to be posted but he did state he didnt want it publically released so better safe than sorry Smiley

Doesn’t the forum only have to protect users information if the information was released through the forum in the users profile or through a post on the forum? If the information was acquired outside of the forum, it is in no way breaking any of the rules to release a members MSN identity.

Read full topic
